JobFullDesc: The Business Engineering and Partner Solutions team (BEPS) provides businesses with the solutions they need to grow today and build for tomorrow. Depending on a business’ needs, BEPS will connect them with in-house engineers, recommend the right partners, or develop a customized combination of both. By integrating technology and partnerships in one team, BEPS can employ the right solution, empowering businesses to face the tasks of today and engineer a path to the future.The Partner Product Solutions team within BEPS accelerates business success across the Facebook Family of Apps (Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp) by building, testing, and activating valuable partner-enabled products. We are looking for a Partner Product Solutions Manager to join our team to identify opportunities where an ecosystem strategy can accelerate growth and client value in high priority areas of the business. This will include  prioritizing new business opportunities, representing partner feedback with product teams, developing strategies to build, test, and activate partner-enabled products, while bringing these plans to execution through a diverse set of cross-functional partners. The Partner Product Solutions Manager will drive our third-party strategy for unlocking more value for businesses on Facebook by integrating their existing assets and workflows into Facebook’s business tools. You will make an impact on a global scale working with a team that solves big problems for Facebook’s fastest growing product areas and partner ecosystems. To be successful in the role, you will bring a General Manager mindset and diverse set of skills to the team - you will be an analytical problem solver, who can simplify complex decisions and prioritize based on trade-offs. You will be a dynamic leader in a complex cross-functional environment who can build relationships, find mutually beneficial opportunities, and influence to drive action. You can bring structure to an ambiguous work stream and can drive accountability across teams, while keeping a pulse on risks and headwinds that can come up in an evolving environment. You are scrappy, collaborative, focused on results, a self-starter, and have demonstrated success in leading cross-functional projects to drive the growth and success of a business.Understand market
